commit message:
Better handling of rotation

By the time the two async operations complete (Gravatar upload, reloading the image) the Fragment can be a new instance if rotation has happened in the meantime. So, have the callbacks send messages (EventBus) so the new Fragments can catch them.

While at it, keep the progress bar state on rotation.
Fixing typo for magic links

When applying the edit image overlay, give focus to the edit container instead of the image

- This fixes an issue where tapping images not wrapped in a link tag would remove them instantly

On API 19 and below, don't set focus on the container when showing the edit overlay

- Giving focus to any part of the image or its container causes problems with instant image deletion on lower APIs
Don't attempt to remove image selection formatting if the image is no longer attached to the document
associate the mediafile with newly created image span
